content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(0)
Consists of steam engine (position 1), boiler (position 2), and offshore pump (position 3).

### Copper plate mine at position(0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 4) and a furnace (position 5).
- Burner mining drill (position 6) and a furnace (position 7).
- Burner mining drill (position 8) and a furnace (position 9).

### Copper cable factory at position(0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position 10) and inserter (position 11) that puts into the assembling machine.
- Beltgroup (position 12) that connects the furnace at position 5 to the assembling machine at position 10.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have enough resources in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, crafting iron-gear-wheels requires iron-plates, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when inspecting furnace inventory
- Verify that the furnace is operational and has items to inspect before checking its inventory.
